name: Dragheart, Luard
effect:
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Retire two grade 1 rear-guards], draw a card, choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:This ability's cost is reduced by [Counter-Blast 1] for each grade 1 in your drop zone. [COST][Counter-Blast 3], return two normal units from your drop zone to your deck, search your deck for up to one "Dragdriver, Luard", ride it as [Stand], and shuffle your deck. At the end of this turn, ride a "Dragheart, Luard" from your soul as [Rest].

name: Phantom Blaster Overlord
effect:
[CONT](VC):During your turn, if you have a "Phantom Blaster Dragon" in your soul, this unit gets [Power] +10000, and its original [Critical] becomes 2.
[AUTO](VC):When it attacks a vanguard, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & retire any number of rear-guards], your opponent chooses the same number of his or her rear-guards as the number of rear-guards retired for this cost, and retires them. Search your deck for up to one card with "Blaster" in its card name, call it to (RC), shuffle your deck, and the called unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Emperor Dragon, Gaia Emperor
effect:
[CONT](VC):During your turn, all of your rear-guards with equip gauge get [Power] +5000. If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, they get [Power] +10000 instead of +5000.
[AUTO](VC):When it attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & retire a rear-guard], and this unit gets the original [Power] of the unit retired for this cost until end of that battle. If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, it gets the original [Critical] as well.

name: Exceptional Expertise, Rising Nova
effect:
[CONT](VC):When you would acquire Imaginary Gift:Force from riding this unit, you get both I and II instead of I or II.
[ACT](VC):[COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose up to two of your grade 3 rear-guards, and this unit gets the abilities of those units until end of turn. This ability may only be used by a card with the same card name once a turn.

name: Evil Governor, Darkface Gredora
effect:
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose up to two of your opponent's rear-guards without any Cradle markers, and put a Cradle marker on each of them. (That unit loses its original abilities, has its [Power] reduced by its original [Power] , cannot boost nor intercept, and when it is retired, you search your deck for up to one card with the same grade as that unit, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck)
[AUTO](VC):When it attacks, [COST][retire a rear-guard], search your deck for up to one grade 3, call it to (RC), and shuffle your deck. If you called, that unit and this unit get [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Dragdriver, Luard
effect:
[CONT](VC):During your turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000 for each of your grade 1 rear-guards. If you have two or more grade 3 cards in your soul, the original [Critical] of all of your grade 1 rear-guards becomes 2.
[AUTO](VC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], search your deck for up to the number of cards in your soul with "Luard" in their card names +1 grade 1 cards, call them to (RC), and shuffle your deck.

name: Dragwizard, Morfessa
effect:
[CONT](RC)/Deck:If you have a vanguard with "Luard" in its card name, this card gets grade -1.
[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle it attacked, if you have four or more rear-guards with original grade 1, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & retire this unit], and call up to one grade 1 from your drop zone to (RC).

name: Freezing Witch, Bendi
effect: [ACT](RC):If your vanguard is "Blaster Dark", [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & retire this unit], search your deck for up to one "Phantom Blaster Dragon", ride it as [Stand], shuffle your deck, and that placed unit cannot use its [ACT] abilities until end of turn.

name: True Ancient Dragon, Bladromeus
effect:
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Retire a rear-guard], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, retire it, search your deck for up to one card with "Ancient Dragon" in its card name, call it to (RC), shuffle your deck, and that unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
[AUTO](VC/RC)[1/turn]:When your drive check reveals a [Front] trigger, you may have this unit get [Critical] +1 until end of turn.

name: Zealous Horn Dragon, Dilophopyro
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed from hand, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], draw a card, and call a card from your hand to (RC). You may put the top card of your deck face down as an equip gauge for that unit.
[AUTO](RC):When placed from equip gauge, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Prism Bird
effect:
[CONT](VC/RC):If a new equip gauge was put for your unit this turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed from hand, look at five cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to one grade 3 from among them and put it into your hand, shuffle your deck, and if you put a card into your hand, discard a card from your hand.

name: Adorbs Perm, Rona
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], search your deck for up to one grade 3, call it to (RC), and shuffle your deck.
[CONT](RC):If you have a grade 3 unit in the same column as this unit, this unit gets "Boost".

name: Acrobat Verdi
effect:
[CONT](VC/RC):If a rear-guard was called by your card's ability this turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed from hand, look at five cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to one grade 3 from among them and put it into your hand, shuffle your deck, and if you put a card into your hand, discard a card from your hand.

name: Machining Meteorbullet
effect:

[ACT](VC/RC)[1/turn]:[COST][[Rest] one other rear-guard with "Machining" in its card name], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Despoiling Mutant, Sticky Bolas
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], look at six cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to a total of two cards with "Darkface" in their different card names from among them and put them into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
[AUTO](RC):When it attacks, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +6000 until end of that battle for each of your opponent's rear-guards with a Cradle marker. If this unit's [Power] is 20000 or greater, draw a card.

[AUTO](VC/RC)[1/turn]:When your drive check reveals a [Front] trigger, you may have this unit get [Critical] +1 until end of turn.

name: Zealous Horn Dragon, Dilophopyro
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed from hand, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], draw a card, and call a card from your hand to (RC). You may put the top card of your deck face down as an equip gauge for that unit.
[AUTO](RC):When placed from equip gauge, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Prism Bird
effect:
[CONT](VC/RC):If a new equip gauge was put for your unit this turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed from hand, look at five cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to one grade 3 from among them and put it into your hand, shuffle your deck, and if you put a card into your hand, discard a card from your hand.

name: Adorbs Perm, Rona
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], search your deck for up to one grade 3, call it to (RC), and shuffle your deck.
[CONT](RC):If you have a grade 3 unit in the same column as this unit, this unit gets "Boost".

name: Acrobat Verdi
effect:
[CONT](VC/RC):If a rear-guard was called by your card's ability this turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed from hand, look at five cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to one grade 3 from among them and put it into your hand, shuffle your deck, and if you put a card into your hand, discard a card from your hand.

name: Machining Meteorbullet
effect:
[CONT](VC/RC):If you have five or more rear-guards, all of your rear-guards with "Machining" in their card names get "Boost".
[ACT](VC/RC)[1/turn]:[COST][[Rest] one other rear-guard with "Machining" in its card name], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Despoiling Mutant, Sticky Bolas
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], look at six cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to a total of two cards with "Darkface" in their different card names from among them and put them into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
[AUTO](RC):When it attacks, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +6000 until end of that battle for each of your opponent's rear-guards with a Cradle marker. If this unit's [Power] is 20000 or greater, draw a card.

name: New Face Mutant, Little Dorcas
effect:
[CONT](VC/RC):During your turn, if your opponent has no [Stand] units, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed from hand, look at five cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to one grade 3 from among them and put it into your hand, shuffle your deck, and if you put a card into your hand, discard a card from your hand.

name: Ambush Dexter
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When placed, [COST][discard a card from your hand], and draw a card.
[AUTO](RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put a grade 2 or greater rear-guard into your soul], search your deck for up to two cards with the same grade as the card put into your soul for this cost, call them to (RC), and shuffle your deck.

name: Intimidating Mutant, Darkface
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [COST][discard a card from your hand], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards without any Cradle markers, and put a Cradle marker on it.
[AUTO](VC/RC):When it attacks a vanguard, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards with a Cradle marker on it, retire it, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle for each grade of the chosen unit.

name: Cherishing Knight, Branwen
effect:
[CONT](VC/RC):During your turn, if your drop zone has three or more grade 1 cards, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed from hand, look at five cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to one grade 3 from among them and put it into your hand, shuffle your deck, and if you put a card into your hand, discard a card from your hand.

name: Dark Shield, Mac Lir
effect:
[CONT]:Sentinel
[AUTO](GC):When placed, [COST][discard a card from your hand], and one of your units cannot be hit until end of that battle.

name: Dragprince, Rute
effect: [AUTO]:When rode upon, draw a card. Then, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 1 or greater, put a Quick Shield ticket into your hand.

name: Phantom Blaster Dragon
effect:
[ACT](VC):[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Retire three rear-guards], and your opponent chooses three of his or her rear-guards, and retires them. This unit gets [Power] +15000/[Critical] +1 until end of turn.
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:If your opponent has four or less cards in his or her damage zone and no rear-guards, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 grade 3], and deal one damage to your opponent's vanguard.

name: Skull Witch, Nemain
effect: [ACT](RC):[COST][[Rest] this unit], search your deck for up to one [Power] 5000 card, call it to an open (RC), and shuffle your deck. This ability may only be used by a card with the same card name once a turn.

name: Fullbau
effect: [AUTO]:When rode upon, draw a card. Then, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 1 or greater, put a Quick Shield ticket into your hand.

name: Quick Shield
effect: One of your attacked units gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle!

name: Cradle
effect:
・The unit with a Cradle marker on it loses its original abilities, has its [Power] reduced by its original [Power] , and cannot boost nor intercept.
・When the unit with a Cradle marker is retired, you search your deck for up to one card with the same grade as that unit, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. (The fighter that put the Cradle marker will search)
